wrongUsernameLength:
Username is too short, or too long!
It should have a minimum of 2 characters and a maximum of 48 characters!
tooShortPassword: Password is too short! It should have at least 8 characters!
withoutNumberPassword: Your password should have at least one number!
commonlyUsedPassword: Your password is too commonly used!
alreadyAssignedEmail: This email adress is already assigned to another account!
